Code:

``` python
from nilearn.datasets import fetch_atlas_harvard_oxford
from nilearn.image import index_img
from nilearn.plotting import plot_stat_map


ho = fetch_atlas_harvard_oxford('cort-prob-2mm')
plot_stat_map(index_img(ho.maps, 31))
```

Error: `ValueError: minvalue must be less than or equal to maxvalue`
title: plot_stat_map fails with non informative error if image is uint8

text: I am slightly confused. Wasn't https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/pull/643 supposed to fix that?
